name: vernemq
description: VerneMQ is a scalable, high-availability MQTT broker designed for IoT and messaging workloads. It supports clustering, plugins, and standard MQTT clients, operated through configuration and CLI tools.
features: MQTT broker: Provide MQTT messaging for IoT devices and applications with full protocol support.
High availability: Run in clustered mode for fault tolerance and automatic failover.
Scalability: Scale horizontally by adding nodes to handle millions of concurrent connections.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for authentication, authorization, and custom logic.
WebSocket support: Allow web browsers to connect via MQTT over WebSockets.
Bridge mode: Bridge to other MQTT brokers for hybrid cloud or multi-site deployments.
QoS levels: Support all MQTT quality of service levels for reliable message delivery.
Retained messages: Store and deliver retained messages to new subscribers automatically.
Session persistence: Maintain client sessions across disconnections for reliable messaging.
Access control: Define fine-grained access controls for topics and client permissions.
Monitoring: Monitor broker performance and client connections through built-in metrics.
CLI management: Manage broker configuration and operations through command-line tools.
